altername_name: Les Aventures Interactives et Commentées de Blake et Mortimer: Le Piège Diabolique
name: The Interactive Adventures of Blake and Mortimer: The Time Trap
overview: This is an interactive comic book based on the comic with the same name by famed Belgian comics artist Edgar P. Jacobs. Dr. Mortimer discovers a Chronoscaph, a machine for travelling through time, in the labs of his old nemesis, Professor Miloch. Mortimer's curiosity gets the better of him and he steps right into the trap. It will propel him into the Jurassic period, the Middle Ages and the 51st century. You will have to foil the traps laid during each voyage.
